attributes.action: Tutorial curriculum scrapped (or changed) in state schools
attributes.additional_details: schools in this day and age are wasting time teaching the pupils about trivial things such as 'puberty' and 'law and order'. I know first hand that this education is certainly not necessary, and is a waste of time for both the pupils and the teachers. it would also cut down on the average school day, meaning that pupils would have more time to do homework and such, and also would prevent students who live miles away from school coming home in the dark, in the middle of winter.
